com.ibm.team.process.common.advice

Interface IAdvisorInfoCollector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IReportInfoCollector

    public interface IAdvisorInfoCollector
extends IReportInfoCollector
    Report info collector which can create new infos for an operation advisor.
    Since:
    0.6
    See Also:
    IOperationAdvisor

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • createProblemInfo

        IAdvisorInfo createProblemInfo(java.lang.String summary,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.lang.String type)
        Creates a problem info of the given type with the given summary and description. Implementors should use this method for reporting problems with an advisable operation as detected by the logic of the advisor.

        The returned info has not yet been added to this collector. Clients are responsible for adding the info to this collector after they have made any desired modifications to it.

        The returned info's severity will be set automatically based on the advisor's configuration. Clients are strongly discouraged from modifying the severity of the returned info.

        Each advisor should create problems with a unique problem type. This is so that "Quick Fixes" can be provided for specific problem types.

        Parameters:
        summary - the summary to set on the new problem
        description - the description to set on the new problem
        type - the problem type
        Returns:
        a newly created info which reports a problem with an advisable operation

      • createExceptionInfo

        IAdvisorInfo createExceptionInfo(java.lang.String summary,
                               java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Creates an exception info for the given throwable. Implementors should use this method for reporting exceptions which prevent this advisor from properly advising an operation.

        The returned info has not yet been added to this collector. Clients are responsible for adding the info to this collector after they have made any desired modifications to it.

        The returned info's severity will be set automatically based on the end-user configuration of the advisor. Clients are strongly discouraged from modifying the severity of the returned info.

        This method should not be used for reporting problems with an operation. The method #createProblemInfo(String, String, String, int) should be used for this purpose instead.

        Parameters:
        summary - the problem summary
        exception - the exception which occurred
        Returns:
        a new participant info which reports an exception
        See Also:
        OperationParticipant#createExceptionInfo(String, Throwable)
